sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21680
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/HardwareVersion.h line 219 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/HardwareVersion.h line 254 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/HardwareVersion.h line 289 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/PostBuildHandler.h line 109 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/PostBuildHandler.h line 159
Requirement is not verified The ECU Hardware Version Number is stored in the OTP memory during production.The component shall provide the interfaces to read the HW-version and the HW-Sample version according to the following table: ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21680 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_16226
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Chorus_HSI/HardwareVersion/Evo/inc/PostBuildHandler.h line 159
Requirement is not verified In runmode the signal DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE shall be used to enable the voltage dividers ("LBI", "AI_UBATT" and "AI_UBATT_WD") for monitoring the KL30 supply voltage. The signal DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE shall be set to High in runmode to enable the voltage dividers. The signal DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE shall be set to Low in sleepmode. Note: Wait 10ms after DO_ENABLE_KL30_DIAGNOSE is set to High before using the first measurement. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_16226 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
